name: Enter Hell
description:
1º : A small village was attacked by demons 

2º: Where a knight suffers with his wife's wounds 

3º: The last demon invades the house looking for more prizes, taking the soul of the poor woman 

4º: The knight chases him to the portal, and without thinking twice, jumps to hell in search of revenge

-----

Moviment - Arrows

Z - Atack

X - Dodge

1 - Use slot
